---
category: news
title: "Artificial intelligence to track UK invasive plant species"
excerpt: "Artificial intelligence is being enlisted in the fight against invasive plants, as experts try to design a system that makes problem species easier to track. Scientists from the UK Centre for Ecology and Hydrology (UKCEH) and Birmingham based company Keen AI are developing a new artificial intelligence system to quickly survey areas such as roadsides for invasive species of plant."
